properties.Name: FormulaEnvironmentalParameter
properties.Description: The environment parameter(s) planned or associated with the recipe formula sequence.

Columns.Name: RecipeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a recipe.

Columns.Name: SequenceNumber
Columns.Description: The sequence in which the items are processed in the formula.

Columns.Name: EnvironmentalParameterId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an Environmental Parameter.

Columns.Name: IngredientId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an Ingredient.

Columns.Name: MinimumEnvironmentalParameterValue
Columns.Description: The minimum environmental parameter associated with the recipe formula sequence.

Columns.Name: MaximumEnvironmentalParameterValue
Columns.Description: The maximum environmental parameter associated with the recipe formula sequence.

Columns.Name: OptimumEnvironmentalParameterValue
Columns.Description: The optimum environmental parameter associated with the recipe formula sequence.

Columns.Name: UnitOfMeasureId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Unit Of Measure.
